in_ID {
    AddressFormat { 
        PostalFormat { "%f%N%a%N%d%N%b%N%s %h %e %r%N%%z %T%N%c%N" }
    }
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: AmPmMarkers */
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: CountryISBNNumber */
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: CountryNumber */
    CurrencyElements { 
            "Rp",
            "IDR ",
            ",",
    }
    DateTimePatterns { 
            "hh:mm:ss",
            "hh:mm:ss",
            "hh:mm:ss",
            "hh:mm:ss",
            "dd/MMMM/yy",
            "EEE dd MMM yyyy hh:mm:ss aa z",
            "dd/MMMM/yy",
            "dd/MMMM/yy",
            "{1} {0}",
    }
    DayAbbreviations { 
            "Min",
            "Sen",
            "Sel",
            "Rab",
            "Kam",
            "Jum",
            "Sab",
    }
    DayNames { 
            "Minggu",
            "Senin",
            "Selasa",
            "Rabu",
            "Kamis",
            "Jumat",
            "Sabtu",
    }
    Identification { 
        Title { "Indonesian locale for Indonesia" }
        Source { "" }
        Address { "" }
        Contact { "" }
        Email { "bug-glibc@gnu.org" }
        Telephone { "" }
        Fax { "" }
        Language { "Indonesian" }
        Territory { "Indonesia" }
        Audience { "" }
        Application { "" }
        Abbreviation { "" }
        Revision { "1.0" }
        Date { "2000-06-29" }
    }
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: LanguageLibraryUse */
    Measurement { "Metric" }
    Messages { 
        YesExpression { "[yY].*" }
        NoExpression { "[tTnN].*" }
        YesStr { "" }
        NoStr { "" }
    }
    MonthAbbreviations { 
            "Jan",
            "Peb",
            "Mar",
            "Apr",
            "Mei",
            "Jun",
            "Jul",
            "Agu",
            "Sep",
            "Okt",
            "Nov",
            "Des",
            "",
    }
    MonthNames { 
            "Januari",
            "Pebruari",
            "Maret",
            "April",
            "Mei",
            "Juni",
            "Juli",
            "Agustus",
            "September",
            "Oktober",
            "November",
            "Desember",
            "",
    }
    NameFormat { 
        NamePattern { "%d%t%g%t%m%t%f" }
        GeneralSalutaion { "" }
        ShortSalutationMr { "" }
        ShortSalutationMiss { "" }
        ShortSalutationMrs { "" }
        LongSalutationMr { "" }
        LongSalutationMiss { "" }
        LongSalutationMrs { "" }
    }
    NumberElements { 
            ",",
            ".",
            ";",
            "%",
            "0",
            "#",
            "-",
            "E",
            "\u2030",
            "\u221E",
            "\uFFFD",
    }
    NumberPatterns { 
            "#,##0.###;-#,##0.###",
            "\u00A4#,##0.00;-\u00A4#,##0.00",
            "#,##0%",
    }
    PaperSize { 
        Hieght { "297" }
        Width { "210" }
        Units { "mm" }
    }
    TelephoneFormat { 
        InternationalFormat { "+%c %a %l" }
        DomesticFormat { "" }
        InternationalDialCode { "" }
        InternationalPrefix { "62" }
    }
}
